sinks.name: TEE_GenerateRandom
sinks.reason: Output buffer could be shared with Normal World, leading to exposure of sensitive data.

sinks.name: TEE_GenerateRandom
sinks.reason: Size parameter could be tainted, leading to buffer overflow or memory corruption.

sinks.name: TEE_Malloc
sinks.reason: Size parameter could be tainted, leading to improper memory allocation and potential buffer overflows or memory corruption.

sinks.name: TEE_MemMove
sinks.reason: Tainted data could be written to shared memory accessible by the Normal World.

sinks.name: TEE_MemMove
sinks.reason: Source pointer could be tainted, leading to reading from an unintended memory location.

sinks.name: TEE_MemMove
sinks.reason: Size parameter could be manipulated, leading to buffer overflow or out-of-bounds access.
